attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi all
This petition has been set up
For one good reason and that is to get
The Prime Minister to help two very
Good friends Cheryl & Linda to get a boyfriend
[preferable one each although they will
not mind sharing]They both live in 
St Albans and need the Prime Minister's
Help.
Thank you all

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
